thread.title: SpiceJet announces flat discount on Max Mondays offer
thread.title_full: SpiceJet announces flat discount on Max Mondays offer

title: SpiceJet announces flat discount on Max Mondays offer
text:
SpiceJet announces flat discount on Max Mondays offer By Zee Media Bureau | Last Updated: Monday, February 20, 2017 - 17:11 0 Follow @ZeeNews 
New Delhi: Budget airline SpiceJet has announced Max Mondays offer wherein customers will get Rs 250 off on SpiceMax category 
The Max Mondays offer is valid only on SpiceMax bookings made a the company's online portal by opting for the offer by way of entering the applicable Promo Code. 

The Offer is valid for both, one-way and round-trip bookings, per passenger per sector for travelling on either a route within India or abroad. 
The Promo Period: Every Moday 
Promo code: Non-SpiceClub member "MAX200‚Äù 
Promo code: SpiceClub Member "MAX250" 
However, this offer can not be clubbed with any other scheme, offer, discount, promotion. First Published: Monday, February 20, 2017 - 17:11
